mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id,i.user_id,i.item_name,i.cmt, i.status, i.min_price, i.rarity,TO_CHAR(i.create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') create_date, TO_CHAR(i.end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') end_date, i.trade_type, i.cat,i.image1,i.image2,i.image3,i.image4,i.image5, u.nickname, u.user_tier, p.card_id,p.card_name,p.card_image,COALESCE(b.bid_count, 0) AS bid_count FROM items i JOIN users u ON u.user_id = i.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, COUNT(*) AS bid_count FROM biddings GROUP BY item_id) b ON i.item_id = b.item_id LEFT JOIN pokemon p ON i.p_card_id = p.card_id ORDER BY i.create_date DESC
